name: Auto Filter Bot
description: Kind of a filter bot where you don't have to add filters manually.

API_HASH.description: Your API Hash from my.telegram.org or @Mytele_ORGbot

APP_ID.description: Your APP ID from my.telegram.org or @Mytele_ORGbot

TG_USER_SESSION.description: A pyrogram user session string. Generate from http://t.me/genStr_HProbot

MAINCHANNEL_ID.description: ID of Channel from which the bot should search files
